prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Nancy Guthridge Free Negro Certificates, 1834-1856. Accession 30892, Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Mae O. Bunch, Detroit, Michigan, 6 August 1980.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Free negress of Louisa and later Halifax County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This Accession consists of five free Negro certificates relating to slaves emancipated in 1834 by the will of Nathaniel Bunch of Louisa County, Virginia. Nancy, formerly Nancy Stewart, now Gurthridge, removed to Halifax County, Virginia in 1836, where she and her sons were registered in 1856.
